explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of multiclass least-square support-vector machine (LS-SVM) and improved particle-swarm optimization (PSO) for loan-risk evaluation, which falls under the domain of machine learning.
explanations.supervised learning: The paper focuses on classification tasks (five-category loan classification), which is a type of supervised learning where models are trained on labeled data.
explanations.classification: The primary goal of the paper is to develop a model for five-category loan classification (FCLC), which is a multiclass classification problem.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper explicitly mentions the use of least-square support-vector machine (LS-SVM), an extension of SVM, for multiclass classification.
explanations.SVM: The paper discusses LS-SVM, which is a variant of SVM, and compares it with other SVM-based methods like one-vs.-one and one-vs.-rest SVM.
